channel.title: Making my stats all 99 -- NEED CODE
channel.description: Could someone give me a code to make all my stats all 99?? Thanks!

item.title: Making my stats all 99 -- NEED CODE
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

[quote=“Lusfr, post:27, topic:181767”][quote author=dragonchain link=topic=243328.msg2058122#msg2058122 date=1203223815]

ffs people learn Java

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("Master"))	{
		for(int i = 0; i < 23; i++)	{
			addSkillXP(14000000, i);
		}	
		sendMessage("Maxed");
	}

im sorry but your post in incorect. different sorces do it differently so…im afraid everyones right

lol!
All sources are based in java so how could this be wrong?

You’ll have to add the ints and varables too.
[/quote]

You sir are wrong that command will work 100% with nothing else[/quote]Yes I know but I’m talking about other codes, for example voids, without them other codes can’t run by themself and think of what it’s doing with your mind and it will happen.

Read full topic

item.title: Making my stats all 99 -- NEED CODE
item.dc:creator: @Tyrael Tyrael
item.description:
@Tyrael wrote:

Under the very last } so it should look like

[code]
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“fish”))
{
if(absY >= 3672 && absY <= 3970)
{
sendMessage(“You cannot teleport above level 20 wilderness…”);
}
else if (absY <= 3672)
{
teleportToX = 3240;
teleportToY = 3435;
sendMessage(“Use the fountain your closet to you rite now to fish.”);
sendMessage(“Make sure what your fishing with is in slot 1 of your items.”);
sendMessage(“Type in ::fishingmenu for more info.”);
}
else if (absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970)
{
teleportToX = 3240;
teleportToY = 3435;
sendMessage(“Use the fountain your closet to you rite now to fish.”);
sendMessage(“Make sure what your fishing with is in slot 1 of your items.”);
sendMessage(“Type in ::fishingmenu for more info.”);
}
else if (absY >= 10112)
{
sendMessage(“You cannot teleport above level 20 wilderness.”);
}
}

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("fish2"))
 {
 if(absY >= 3672 && absY <= 3970) 
 {
 sendMessage("You cannot teleport above level 20 wilderness.");
 }
 else if (absY <= 3672)
{
	teleportToX = 2651;
	teleportToY = 3370;
	sendMessage("Use the well your closest to you rite now to fish.");
	sendMessage("Make sure what your fishing with is in slot 1 of your items.");
	sendMessage("Type in ::fishingmenu for more info.");
}
  else if (absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970)
{
	teleportToX = 2651;
	teleportToY = 3370;
	sendMessage("Use the well your closest to you rite now to fish.");
	sendMessage("Make sure what your fishing with is in slot 1 of your items.");
	sendMessage("Type in ::fishingmenu for more info.");
}
 else if (absY >= 10112)
 {
 sendMessage("You cannot teleport above level 20 wilderness.");
 }
    }

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“master”) && playerRights >= 3)
{
addSkillXP(486000000, 0);
addSkillXP(486000000, 1);
addSkillXP(486000000, 2);
addSkillXP(486000000, 3);
addSkillXP(486000000, 4);
addSkillXP(486000000, 5);
addSkillXP(486000000, 6);
addSkillXP(486000000, 7);
addSkillXP(486000000, 8);
addSkillXP(486000000, 9);
addSkillXP(486000000, 10);
addSkillXP(486000000, 11);
addSkillXP(486000000, 12);
addSkillXP(486000000, 13);
addSkillXP(486000000, 14);
addSkillXP(486000000, 15);
addSkillXP(486000000, 16);
addSkillXP(486000000, 17);
addSkillXP(486000000, 18);
addSkillXP(486000000, 19);
addSkillXP(486000000, 20);
addSkillXP(486000000, 21);
addSkillXP(486000000, 22);
addSkillXP(486000000, 23);
sendMessage(“You now have 99 in all stats.”);
}[/code]

Read full topic

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("fish2"))

item.title: Making my stats all 99 -- NEED CODE
item.dc:creator: @Tyrael Tyrael
item.description:
@Tyrael wrote:

Alright so will use fish.

You should have something like

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("fish")

{
teleportToX = xxxx;
teleportToY = xxxx;
}

Under the }
add

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 3) { addSkillXP(486000000, 0); addSkillXP(486000000, 1); addSkillXP(486000000, 2); addSkillXP(486000000, 3); addSkillXP(486000000, 4); addSkillXP(486000000, 5); addSkillXP(486000000, 6); addSkillXP(486000000, 7); addSkillXP(486000000, 8); addSkillXP(486000000, 9); addSkillXP(486000000, 10); addSkillXP(486000000, 11); addSkillXP(486000000, 12); addSkillXP(486000000, 13); addSkillXP(486000000, 14); addSkillXP(486000000, 15); addSkillXP(486000000, 16); addSkillXP(486000000, 17); addSkillXP(486000000, 18); addSkillXP(486000000, 19); addSkillXP(486000000, 20); addSkillXP(486000000, 21); addSkillXP(486000000, 22); addSkillXP(486000000, 23); sendMessage("You now have 99 in all stats."); }

item.dc:creator: @Goodoo_dolls Goodoo dolls
item.description:
@Goodoo_dolls wrote:

umm… ok find

else if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5)
	{

after the last {

add the master command
it should look like this

else if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5) { if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("maxme") && playerRights >= 2) { addSkillXP(48600000, 0); addSkillXP(48600000, 1); addSkillXP(48600000, 2); addSkillXP(48600000, 3); addSkillXP(48600000, 4); addSkillXP(48600000, 5); addSkillXP(48600000, 6); addSkillXP(48600000, 7); addSkillXP(48600000, 8); addSkillXP(48600000, 9); addSkillXP(48600000, 10); addSkillXP(48600000, 11); addSkillXP(48600000, 12); addSkillXP(48600000, 13); addSkillXP(48600000, 14); addSkillXP(48600000, 15); addSkillXP(48600000, 16); addSkillXP(48600000, 17); addSkillXP(48600000, 18); addSkillXP(48600000, 19); addSkillXP(48600000, 20); addSummonXP(886000000); addSkillXP(48600000, 21); addSkillXP(48600000, 22); addSkillXP(48600000, 23); addSkillXP(48600000, 24); sendMessage("you are now maxed out!"); }

item.dc:creator: @_Vengeance _Vengeance
item.description:
@_Vengeance wrote:

[quote=“Goodoo dolls, post:3, topic:181767”]search for this

for (int lvl = 1; lvl <=
press enter 3 times or until there is no more then do you see the number after <= mine is 200

mine looks like this’

for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 200; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 400.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0)); output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; } } return 200; }

change the 200 in return and after <= to ur max lvl in this case chage it to 99[/quote]
That was completely unrelated to the question.
